source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_00<tab>Konogg is still looking considerably worse for his sister's absence.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_00<tab>コメラの村のコノッグは、苦悩しているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_01<tab>Konogg, still inconsolable following the disappearance of his sister Anogg, explains that little has changed in Komra since last you spoke. This indeed seems to be the case, as several of the same villagers who previously spoke out against the twins soon arrive to further express their disgruntlement. Among them is a man you have not seen before, who hastens to chastise Konogg for his culpability in the tragedy that led to his wife's severe injury. Your dwarven friend is visibly shaken, and dissolves into tears on the spot.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
活動停止していた２Ｐの再起動に成功したアノッグとコノッグ。２Ｐが「鍵」と呼ばれる装置を操作すると、突如、機械遺跡の坑道を激しい揺れが襲った。坑道の外へと飛び出した冒険者と双子のドワーフ族は、コメラの村がアンドロイドたちの攻撃を受けている光景を目撃する。２Ｐを止めるため、彼女とそっくりな姿をしたアンドロイド「２Ｂ」とともに、ドヴェルガル山脈に突如出現した巨大な建造物へ進入する一行。最奥で待ち受けていた２Ｐを退けることに成功するも、アノッグは意図せず２Ｐの策謀に手を貸してしまっていた事実を知り、ひどく落胆する。さらにその噂を聞きつけたコメラの村人たちが、双子の姉弟を弾劾せんと、坑道まで押しかけてきた。２Ｂの介入により村人たちは退散したが、機能停止している少年型のアンドロイド「９Ｓ」を抱き上げると、２Ｂは立ち去って行った。これで一連の騒動は沈静化したかに思えたが、今度は双子の姉、アノッグが姿をくらました。残された弟コノッグは、呆然と立ち尽くすことしかできないのであった……。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
コノッグは、アンドロイドたちによる襲撃の件で村人たちから責められ、泣いてしまったようだ。コルシア島のコメラの村の「コノッグ」に、エモート「なぐさめる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_02<tab>With some effort and a few gentle pats on the back, you succeed in raising Konogg's spirits somewhat. He is determined to find a way to help the man and his wife, but fears that he will have little luck determining what might improve their situation while the other villagers are so ill-disposed toward civil conversation with him. Naturally, you volunteer to make inquiries in his stead.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_02<tab>コノッグをなぐさめると、少し元気を取り戻したようだ。コメラの村の事情に詳しそうな村人から話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_03<tab>You speak with two of the dwarves you saw previously, rightly guessing that they would have some idea of what might be of comfort to the injured parties. The answer─perhaps predictably─is alcohol, with mead being the beverage of choice.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_03<tab>利口な村人と話して、襲撃の被害に遭った夫婦の話を聞いた。コメラの村の「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_04<tab>Konogg is happy enough to seize upon the idea of a gift of mead for lack of any better ones, though the two of you soon realize that, with the village's liquor stores having gone up in flames, you will need to travel to Stilltide to purchase it. His sense of duty guides Konogg to insist on making the journey himself─with you as a guide, of course.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_04<tab>コノッグと話して、夫婦が蜂蜜酒を好んでいたことを伝えると、スティルタイドまでの道案内を頼まれた。ドヴェルガル山脈にいる「コノッグ」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_05<tab>You meet Konogg outside of Komra to explain the route you will be taking to Stilltide. Despite the unfortunate circumstances surrounding it─or perhaps because of them─he seems eager to make the trip.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_05<tab>コノッグと話して、スティルタイドまでの道を教えた。スクリー山地にいる「コノッグ」とさらに話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_06<tab>Konogg halts at the top of the Ladder to take in the sights. If they do not provide the enlightenment he seeks, perhaps you can.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_06<tab>コノッグと話した。トップラングにいる「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_07<tab>At Konogg's insistence, you regale him with the tale of how you and the people of Norvrandt restored the massive device to functionality. It is unclear whether he is more inspired or intimidated by this, but in any case, he presses on.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_07<tab>コノッグと話した。ボトムラングにいる「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_08<tab>Fortunately, you have not provided Konogg with detailed information on the location of the Leaky Keel, so he cannot dash away the moment you alight from the Ladder. Once you confirm the direction of your destination; however, he is filled with vigor at the prospect of nearing his goal, and does just that.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_08<tab>コノッグと話した。スティルタイドにいる「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_09<tab>You find Konogg mentally fortifying himself outside the Leaky Keel. Whether he is intimidated at the prospect of entering an establishment so far from his village or simply trying to remember how to make a polite request after so long bossing an indulgent adventurer around is anyone's guess. Fortunately, he has no cause to worry, as Theva is charmed by his earnestness and kindly brings him a bottle of her finest mead.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_09<tab>コノッグと話した。コノッグは、穴あき小舟亭のセヴァから、蜂蜜酒を買い入れることができた。コメラの村にいる「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_10<tab>Mead in hand, Konogg takes the lead back to the village. Unable to know what kind of reception the gift will earn, you elect to take him up on his offer to join him as he delivers it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_10<tab>コメラの村のコノッグと話して、被害に遭った夫婦の見舞いへ向かうことになった。コメラの村にいる「コノッグ」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_11<tab>Konogg attempts to deliver the mead along with heartfelt sentiments, but the injured woman's husband will have none of it. His hopes of helping in some small way thoroughly dashed, Konogg flees, more distressed than ever.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_11<tab>コノッグと話して、見舞いのために悲しむ村人の妻を訪ねたが、門前払いにされた。逃げるように走り去ってしまった「コノッグ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_12<tab>As you attempt to chase down Konogg, you come upon a discarded bottle of mead─and then the dig site chief, who tells you that he but moments ago saw Konogg fleeing toward the crater. He asks that you continue your pursuit with haste, as the dwarf is in no state to be wandering around such a dangerous location.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_12<tab>コノッグを探していたところ、蜂蜜酒の入った瓶を見つけた。すると、そこへドワーフ族の親方がやってきて、コノッグがクレーターに向かったという情報を話してくれた。人形タチノ軍事基地の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB08A01 /var>」で見渡そう。人形タチノ軍事基地へは、コルシア島のコメラの村から移動できるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_13<tab>Though you travel a fair distance into the Puppets' Bunker, you see no sign of Konogg. He must have been running as fast as his tiny legs could carry him.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_13<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB08A01 /var>で見渡してコノッグを探したが、見つからなかった。人形タチノ軍事基地の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB08B01 /var>」で再度見渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_14<tab>You proceed to the command room, but still have yet to find Konogg─a worrying state of affairs indeed.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_14<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB08B01 /var>で再度見渡してコノッグを探したが、見つからなかった。人形タチノ軍事基地で「コノッグ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_15<tab>Deep within the alien ship, you at last locate Konogg...communing with a mysterious orb. The Echo provides some insight into the situation, though perhaps not as much as one would like: Anogg was caught in a rockslide and tumbled to the bottom of a cliff, only for her─or something identical─to appear before Konogg when he happened upon the strange white orb you now see. This raises a variety of vital questions, but as Konogg's safety is paramount, you convince him to return to the village for the time being.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_15<tab>人形タチノ軍事基地の最奥で、コノッグを発見した。白い球のような物体にうわごとのように話しかけるコノッグの姿に、冒険者の超える力が反応した。冒険者は過去視を通して、アノッグが落石からコノッグをかばって崖下へと転落したこと、転落したアノッグを探している最中に、コノッグが白い球を発見したこと、さらに白い球からアノッグそっくりのドワーフ族が吐き出される光景を視た。機械遺跡の坑道の「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_16<tab>Konogg insists that he is fine, despite being quite clearly anything but. It appears unlikely that you will get much else out of him.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_16<tab>コノッグと話した。コメラの村の「ドワーフ族の親方」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_17<tab>You report what you have seen to the dig site chief, who assures you─and himself─that Anogg is surely alive and well, and will like as not return soon enough. He asks that you keep mum on the subject of the orb until Konogg has had time to recover, that there be no further cause for panic among the villagers.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_17<tab>ドワーフ族の親方と話して、コノッグを通して視た過去について伝えたが、親方にとっては理解に苦しむ話だったようだ。行方不明になったアノッグや、村を襲ったアンドロイドなど気がかりなことは多いが、今は待つことしかできない。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_18<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_18<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_19<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_19<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_20<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_21<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_22<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_22<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_23<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_00<tab>/comfort Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_00<tab>コノッグに「なぐさめる」をする

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_01<tab>Speak with villagers that are a likely source of gossip.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_01<tab>事情に詳しそうな村人から話を聞く

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_02<tab>コノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Konogg again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_03<tab>再度コノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Konogg yet again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_04<tab>さらにコノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Konogg at Top Rung.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_05<tab>トップラングのコノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_06<tab>Speak with─you guessed it─Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_06<tab>ボトムラングのコノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Konogg in Stilltide. (This time, with feeling.)
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_07<tab>スティルタイドのコノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Konogg in Komra.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_08<tab>コノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_09<tab>Speak with Konogg once more.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_09<tab>再度コノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_10<tab>Search for Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_10<tab>コノッグを探す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_11<tab>Search for Konogg in the crater.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_11<tab>人形タチノ軍事基地の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB08A01 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_12<tab>Search for Konogg in the command room.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_12<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB08B01 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_13<tab>Search for Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_13<tab>コノッグを探す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_14<tab>Speak with Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_14<tab>コノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_15<tab>Speak with the dig site chief.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_15<tab>コメラの村のドワーフ族の親方と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_16<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_16<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_17<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_17<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_18<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_18<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_19<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_19<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_20<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_20<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_21<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_21<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_22<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_22<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_23<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_001<tab>Here to see me? I appreciate it, but...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_001心配して声をかけてくれたのですか……？
ありがとうございます……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_002<tab>I'm afraid I don't have much to tell you. There's still no sign of Anogg, and the villagers are...well, you know how they are.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_002依然として、アノッグの行方はわからないし、
村人達も分断されたまま……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_003<tab>Can't blame them, really. 2P used us─she said as much─but we were the ones who allowed ourselves to be manipulated. I keep thinking about what we might have done differently...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_003２Ｐは、計画のためにボク達を利用したと言っていました。
アンドロイド達に村が襲撃され、大きな被害が出たのは、
ボクとアノッグのせいなんでしょうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A1_000_001<tab>It serves no one to dwell on what could have been.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A1_000_001<tab>悔やんでばかりいてもしかたない

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A1_000_002<tab>You can't change what you've done, but you can change what you do now.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A1_000_002<tab>自分で考えないと意味がない

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_005<tab>You're right. I have to fix this, somehow. Or at least try.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_005そうですね……。
小さなことでも、自分にできることを見つけて、
村人達との溝も解消していかないと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERC03954_000_006<tab>What are you lazing about here for, Konogg? Where's Anogg?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERC03954_000_006おい、コノッグ……
こんなところで、何をしている？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERA03954_000_007<tab>She's still up to no good, I bet! And run off before we could make her own up to it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERA03954_000_007おや？　いつも一緒にいるアノッグの姿が見えないが……
何かやましいことでもあって、逃げたんじゃないだろうな？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_008<tab>Don't be ridiculous! Anogg, she's...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_008そっ……そんなことない！
アノッグはきっと…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_009<tab>She's what?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_009<tab>きっと……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_100_009<tab>Go on. Explain to us where exactly Anogg is.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_100_009なぁ、そのあとにどんな言葉が続くんだ……？
言ってみろ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_010<tab>I...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_010<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_011<tab>Because I'll tell you where <var 1A 02 /var>my wife<var 1A 01 /var> is... She's at death's door because of the injuries she suffered in the attack!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_011俺の妻はなぁ、襲撃のときに重傷を負って……
寝たきりになっちまったんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_100_011<tab>Even <var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> she wakes, she may never make a full recovery...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_100_011<tab>もう……希望なんてない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_012<tab>So if you know what's good for you, you'll get out of this village before I do something we'll both regret.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_012お前を見ているとイライラする、口も利きたくない……
この村から出ていけ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_013<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_013<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_014<tab><sob>
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_014…………ううっ、
ボクは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>Konogg seems in dire need of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_015コノッグは泣いてしまったようだ。
傷ついたコノッグを「なぐさめて」あげよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_050<tab>I...<sniff> I...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_050ボクは……ボクは……
うぅっ…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Konogg is openly weeping. Someone ought to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>泣き止まないコノッグを「なぐさめて」元気づけてあげよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_052<tab><sniff> ...Sorry. I really shouldn't be wallowing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_052……すみません……ありがとうございます。
そうですよね……辛いのはボクだけじゃない。
クヨクヨしてちゃだめだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_053<tab>I wish I could do something to help...for that man and his wife, especially.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_053襲撃の被害に遭ってしまったご夫婦のために、
何かできることを探そうと思います……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_054<tab>But I don't know either of them well, and I doubt anyone is willing to talk to me now...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_054しかし……ボクは彼らのことを多くは知りません……。
せめて話ができれば……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A2_000_001<tab>I'll ask around for you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A2_000_001<tab>代わりに話をしてこよう

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A2_000_002<tab>I'll see what I can do. But you owe me─double if anyone punches me in the face.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A2_000_002<tab>ひとつ貸しだぞ

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_056<tab>Really? Thank you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_056あなたが、代わりに話を聞いてきてくださるんですか？
ありがとうございます……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_057<tab>With a bit of luck, they'll open up to you. If there's anything I can do to make things better, anything at all...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_057もしボクに、あのご夫婦のためにできることがあったら……
全力で頑張ります！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_058<tab>In the meantime, I'll find another way to make myself useful. It's not as if there's a shortage of rubble that needs clearing around here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_058聞き込みをして頂いている間、
ボクは村の片付けをしようと思います。
少しでも、村の役に立ちたいので……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_060<tab>I'm sure I can be of <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> use...somehow...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_060ボクは、ボロボロになった村の片付けをしておきます。
小さなことでも村の役に立てるように……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_100<tab>Look who it is. I hope you're not up to more mischief with Anogg and Konogg.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_100アノッグやコノッグとつるんでる旅の人じゃないか？
何の用だ？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_101<tab>A woman with severe injuries and an angry husband... Yes, I know who you mean.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_101襲撃の被害に遭った村人について聞きたい？
あぁ……奥さんが重傷を負ってしまった夫婦がいたな……
あんなことになってしまって、可哀そうだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_102<tab>I doubt there's much to be done, but I won't stop you from trying. Those two have always been inseparable─I don't think I've ever seen them <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> holding hands. Can't imagine how he's feeling, now that she's in such a state.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_102あの夫婦は仲が良かったよ。
よくふたりで、手を繋いで出歩いているのを見たからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_103<tab>You're friends with the poor dears, aren't you?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_103<tab>そういえば君は、あの夫婦と懇意にしていなかったか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_104<tab>The very best of friends. And how I long for those days we drank away, without a care in the world! She always loved the mead...we all did...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_104あぁ……良い人達だよ。
酒好きで、僕もよく一緒に酒盛りをしたな……。
特に蜂蜜酒が大好きで……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_105<tab><sniff> It was good mead...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_105怪我がよくなったら、また一緒に酒盛りをしたいけど……。
今は、そんな平和な日々が戻ってくることを、
願うことしかできないよ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_106<tab>...That it was. There, there.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_106<tab>あぁ……そうだな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_110<tab>Perhaps someday we'll be able to go back to the way things used to be.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_110ボロボロになった村を眺めていると……
気が滅入ってくるなぁ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_115<tab>No...I'll never have that kind of peace of mind again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_115<tab>この村にまた、平和な日常が戻ってくるんだろうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_150<tab>They talked to you? And no one got violent?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_150どうでしたか？
襲撃の被害に遭ったご夫婦について、
話を聞くことはできましたか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_151<tab>Mead? I suppose we <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> dwarves, so maybe it's not such a terrible idea. <sigh> But as far as I know, none of our stores survived the attack.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_151なるほど、あのご夫婦は蜂蜜酒を好んでいた、と。
でも、この村では蜂蜜酒は自家製が多いんですよね……。
いったい、どこで手に入れれば……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A3_000_001<tab>Down the cliff we go, then.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A3_000_001<tab>崖の下まで降りれば……

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A3_000_002<tab>We can buy more in Stilltide.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A3_000_002<tab>スティルタイドという村で蜂蜜酒を買える

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_153<tab>Oh! If there's some available for purchase, I'd happily spend the coin. Can you show me the way?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_153それなら、ボクでも……！
この期に及んであなたに頼みごとをするのは気が引けますが……
崖の下まで道案内をお願いできないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q4_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A4_000_001<tab>I could go myself.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A4_000_001<tab>代わりに行こう

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A4_000_002<tab>It's too dangerous for you out there.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A4_000_002<tab>村の外は危険だ

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_155<tab>No! No, I insist. I've accompanied you to much more dangerous places before, and I assure you I won't be a burden. And...I need to do this.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_155いえ！　これはきっと……
自分の足で行かないと、意味がないと思うんです！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_156<tab>I still have a few things to tidy away before I leave, so I'll meet you at the bridge in a bit.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_156そうしたら、ボクは掃除したゴミをまとめてきます。
人目につかないように、少し離れた場所で待ち合わせましょう。
村の入口を出た先にある、橋のあたりでお願いします！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_200<tab>There you are! Now, if you'll show me the way?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_200待っていました……！
スティルタイドまでの道筋を教えてもらえますか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_201<tab>Ah, the Ladder! I've never used it before. This will be an adventure!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_201なるほど……まずは昇降機を使って、
崖の下に降りるんですね。
では、さっそく向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_250<tab>The view is different outside of the village. Maybe I can find the perspective I need.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_250なんだか村の外に遠出するのは久しぶりです……。
こうして一歩踏み出すことが、大切なのかもしれませんね。
先に進みましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_300<tab>It's massive! How in the world did you get this moving?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_300間近で見ると、すごい迫力ですね……！
しかし……こんなに大きな機械、
いったいどうやって動かしたのですか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q5_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A5_000_001<tab>With a great deal of help.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A5_000_001<tab>これを動かすまでに、沢山の人の協力があった……

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A5_000_002<tab>I don't quite understand it myself. Luckily, I have people for that.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A5_000_002<tab>困難を乗り越えようとした人達の努力があった……

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_302<tab>Well, go on! Tell me all about it!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_302<tab>その話……ボクに聞かせてくれませんか！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_303<tab>I had no idea all of that happened in Eulmore! And the Talos...marvelous!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_303ユールモアという国での事件……
タロースの復活や、人々との繋がり……。
コメラの村に来るまでに、色々なことがあったんですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_304<tab>I wish I had your ability to bring out the best in people. Maybe then Komra wouldn't be...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_304みんなを先導して、団結した力で困難を乗り越える……
ボクもあなたみたいに勇気を持てれば、
コメラの村の状況だって、きっと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_305<tab>Never mind. I thank you for your enlightening tale. And now...we descend!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_305貴重なお話、ありがとうございました！
さっそく、みんなの努力が動かした昇降機に乗りこみましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_350<tab>Far be it from me to complain after having insisted upon accompanying you, but...are we there yet?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_350<tab>スティルタイドまでは、あとどれくらいですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_351<tab>Eastward it is, then.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_351ここから東の方角に進めばいいのですね！
行きましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_400<tab>Deep breaths, Konogg. Just act natural. Confident. You can do this. ...Yaaah!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_400ここで蜂蜜酒を買うことができるのですね……！？
中に入りましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_401<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Good to see you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_401おや、久しぶりだね。
酒を飲みに来た……ってわけじゃなさそうだけど。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_402<tab>Who's your friend? He seems...eager.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_402<tab>隣にいるのは……珍しいお客さんだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_403<tab>L-Lali-ho! I would like some mead! Please! Ma'am!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_403ラ、ラリホー。
旅の人に案内してもらって、来たんです。
蜂蜜酒が欲しいのですが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_404<tab>Well, I can't say “no” to one who asks so nicely...and any friend of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s is welcome here. I'll bring out our finest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_404あなたのお仲間なら、半端な品を出すわけにはいかないね。
すぐに用意するから、少し待っててちょうだい。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_405<tab>Did you see? I did it! Ah, it feels so good to be working toward a goal again...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_405これで、被害に遭ったご夫婦へお見舞いに行くことができます……
背中を押してくれて、ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_406<tab>Here we are.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_406はい、お待たせ。
これでいいかしら。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_407<tab>Thank you, ma'am! I think this should be sufficient payment...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_407ありがとうございます。
お代は置いておきますね。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_408<tab>Let's hurry back. As exhilarating as this adventure has been, I want to make a gift of the mead right away.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_408<tab>よし、コメラの村に戻りましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_450<tab>Would you like to come with me? When I deliver the mead, I mean.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_450被害に遭ったご夫婦は、お見舞いを受け入れてくれるでしょうか……
もしよかったら、一緒についてきてもらえませんか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q6_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A6_000_001<tab>Someone has to look out for you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A6_000_001<tab>仕方ないな

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A6_000_002<tab>Of course I will.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A6_000_002<tab>最後まで付き合うよ

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_452<tab>I appreciate it. I admit that I'm a bit nervous... But this is my chance to help, if only in a small way, so I have to take it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_452ありがとうございます……！
迷惑ばかりかけてすみません……
被害に遭ったご夫婦の家に向かいますね。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_500<tab>Excuse us! We, um...we wanted to offer our best wishes. And...my sincere apology, as well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_500あの……すみません……コノッグです！
ボク、何もできないけど……
せめてもと思って、お見舞いに……来たんです！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_501<tab>I know it doesn't come close to making up for what you've been through, but I brought you this. I thought that maybe you could share it...later...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_501手土産に、蜂蜜酒をもってきたんです。
今は……飲めないかもしれないけれど……
怪我が治ったら、奥さんとご一緒に……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_502<tab>...
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_503<tab>Go away. We don't want anything from you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_503…………帰ってくれ。
そんな物は、受け取れない。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_504<tab>...Oh.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_504<tab>……そうですか。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_505<tab>All I <var 1A 02 /var>want<var 1A 01 /var> is for you to <var 1A 02 /var>sod off<var 1A 01 /var> so that me and my wife never have to see you again!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_505何もしてくれなくていい。
出来る事なら……妻があの事件を忘れられるように、
この村から出ていってほしいがな。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_506<tab>I'm sorry...
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_507<tab>Konogg sounded to be in considerable distress. You had best follow him lest he come to harm.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_507コノッグの様子が心配だ。
追いかけよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_550<tab>The bottle of mead that Konogg had so earnestly wished would cheer the unfortunate couple now lies forlorn.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_550蜂蜜酒が入った瓶が落ちている。
コノッグが捨てたのだろうか。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_551<tab>(-???-)Lali-we've got another situation in our beards-ho!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_551<tab>(-？？？？-)おぉ、いいところに。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_552<tab>Konogg just ran right past me toward the crater. I don't know about you, but I'd really rather not have him there by himself─especially not when he's so upset. I could hear the sobs from yalms away...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_552ちょうど村に戻るところだったのだが……
クレーターに向かって走っていくコノッグを見かけたんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_553<tab>What's that all about?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_553それが、なんだかとても思い詰めた様子でな……。
何かあったのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q7_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q7_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A7_000_001<tab>There's this injured woman...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A7_000_001<tab>コノッグと、怪我をした村人の妻を見舞いに行ったら……

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A7_000_002<tab>The villagers still blame him for all of it...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A7_000_002<tab>妻が怪我を負った村人から、コノッグが責められて……

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_555<tab>Hmm... It's a tragic state of affairs all around.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_555<tab>そうか……そんなことが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_556<tab>The man you met─his wife was with child before her injury. Can't blame him for lashing out, given the circumstances.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_556言いにくいことだが……
襲撃の被害に遭った、あの村人の妻は、
もうすぐ子供が生まれる予定だったんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_557<tab>But that doesn't mean Konogg deserves to take the brunt of it all.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_557だからといって、
コノッグがその責任の全てを背負わされるなんておかしい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_558<tab>I'd consider it a personal favor if you'd find him and tell him so. ...<var 1A 02 /var>Another<var 1A 01 /var> personal favor, at any rate.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_558力になれなくて申し訳ないが、
こんなことを頼めるのはあんただけだ。
クレーターに向かったコノッグを連れ戻してくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_559<tab>He's not the most athletic dwarf I've ever met, so with any luck he won't have gotten far while we've been talking.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_559きっとまだ遠くまでは行ってないだろう……
めぼしい場所で見渡してみれば、見つかるかもしれない。
よろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_560<tab>I'll go and have a word with certain folks in the village. See if we can't repair some of the damage that's been done.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_560<tab>俺は、コメラの村に戻って村人達の様子を見てくるよ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_565<tab>I've never seen Konogg so worked up. I hope he's all right...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_565あんな風に思い詰めたコノッグは、見たことがないな……
大丈夫だろうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_600<tab>You find no sign of the dwarf you seek─a state of affairs that you are becoming all too familiar with.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_600コノッグは見当たらない。
この辺りにはいないようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_650<tab>You've still to see so much as a wisp of beard disappearing round the corner. Konogg must be further down.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_650コノッグは見当たらない。
もっと奥まで行ってしまったのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_700<tab>A-Anogg...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_700<tab>……アノッグ……アノッ……グ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_701<tab>Anogg! Look over here!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_701<tab>アノッグ！　早くこっちに来て！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_702<tab>Don't run off, Konogg! It's dangerous. Let your big sister take the lead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_702こら！　コノッグ、ここは落石が多いんだ、
勝手に先に進むんじゃない！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_703<tab>Waugh!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_703<tab>ハッ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_704<tab>Wicked white! Konogg, move!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_704まずい……落石が！？
コノッグ！　逃げろ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_100_705<tab>A-Anogg? Anogg! Are you down there? I'm coming!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_100_705ア……アノッグ……まさか、
落石に巻き込まれて、崖の下に……！？
どこか、下に降りる道を探さないと……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_705<tab>Anogg! Answer me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_705アノッグ！　アノッグー！
返事をしてよー！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_706<tab>No...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_706<tab>そんな……まさか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_100_707<tab>A-Anogg...? Are you behind this...thing?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_100_707<tab>何だ……コレ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_707<tab>Anogg, please! Say something!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_707アノッグ！　い……いるんだろ！？
返事をしてよ！　アノッグー！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_708<tab>(-White Orb-)○! ※×□＃◇×○!
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_709<tab>Wh-What?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_709<tab>うわっ……！　なっ……なんだ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_710<tab>(-Dwarf Facsimile-)◇! ○※□×※▽○!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_710<tab>(-複製されたドワーフ族-)◇！○※□×※▽○！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_711<tab>Anogg! It's you...isn't it?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_711<tab>ア……アノッグ……なの……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_712<tab>(-Dwarf Facsimile-)Ko...nogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_712<tab>(-複製されたドワーフ族-)コ……ノ……ッッグ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q8_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q8_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A8_000_001<tab>That thing from the orb can't be Anogg. I'm sorry.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A8_000_001<tab>なぜ白い球からアノッグが？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A8_000_002<tab>Konogg... I think Anogg may be...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A8_000_002<tab>ずっと以前にアノッグは死んでいたのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_714<tab>How do you know? How did you even know about back when she─
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_714あなたは、どうやってあの時のことを……
いえ、そんなことはどうでもいい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_715<tab>Never mind. It doesn't matter. <var 1A 02 /var>Anogg<var 1A 01 /var> is what matters. Anogg, she...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_715アノッグは、アノッグです……。
ボクの大切な家族なんです……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q9_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q9_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A9_000_001<tab>I know. But you can't stay here.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A9_000_001<tab>こんなところにいてはいけない

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A9_000_002<tab>Let's go home and take some time to think, all right?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A9_000_002<tab>とにかく今は、拠点に戻ろう

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_717<tab>Fine...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_717<tab>わかりました……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_750<tab>Sorry... I'm fine. Everything's fine.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_750心配をかけてすみませんでした……
気分も少し落ち着きました。
親方にもそう言っておいてください……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_755<tab>I just...need to be by myself for a while.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_755心配をかけてすみませんでした……
しばらくここで、休んでいます……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_800<tab>Tell me you found him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_800おぉ、旅の人よ。
戻ったか。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_801<tab>What's the matter?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_801<tab>何かあった様子だが、説明してくれるか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q10_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q10_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A10_000_001<tab>I'm afraid something has happened to Anogg...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A10_000_001<tab>アノッグが実は死んでいた……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A10_000_002<tab>I don't know what I saw, but...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A10_000_002<tab>クレーターに出現した謎の白い球が……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_803<tab>...She fell from a cliff, you say? And then when she reappeared from this “orb” there wasn't a scratch on her?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_803おいおい、なんだそりゃ……
謎の白い球と……死んだアノッグがそこから……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_804<tab>I admit that sounds bad. But I found those two in these very tunnels myself, years ago.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_804そんなことあるものか。
実はな……アノッグとコノッグは、
俺が坑道で拾った孤児なんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_805<tab>They were a pair of troublemakers since the start, and they've always been a little strange, to be sure. They have good hearts, though─both of them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_805あいつらは昔から、人に迷惑をかけっぱなしの悪ガキだったが、
根は悪い奴じゃない。
死んだなんて……縁起でもないこと言わないでくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_806<tab>Anogg's too headstrong to let a little tumble keep her down. And I'm certain she'll be back with us before you know it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_806詳しいことはわからないが……
今は村人達をあまり刺激したくない。
今回の件は内密にしておこう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_807<tab>As for the orb...I haven't the slightest idea, so don't you go prodding it. And keep it quiet for now. We may not be able to keep Konogg from dashing off again later, but we can preserve the peace for now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_807とにかく、あんたとコノッグが無事でよかった。
アノッグも早く帰ってくるといいんだがな……。
しばらくは村の様子を見守ることにしよう。
